content: PFF Panel 2 Seedly PFF 2019 CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019If I got 1million at 65 years old in my cpf, how much can I withdraw monthly? 2 answersAnswerBump1

Leslie Koh, Associate Financial Services Manager at Prudential Assurance Company SingaporeLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered 4d agoYou can consider using this from CPF Board to calculate: https://www.cpf.gov.sg/eSvc/Web/Schemes/LifeEstimator/LifeEstimator0 comments1

Alvin TeoLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered 4d agoWhich CPF account? By age 65, the monies should be in CPF Life. Amounts withdraw-able also subject to which CPF Life plan you choose. Do use CPF Life estimator to get a good gauge.0 comments0
